title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js.
requirements: Strong knowledge of JavaScript and modern frameworks
Experience with responsive web design
Familiarity with REST APIs and state management
Ability to work in an Agile environment

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and databases. Experience with Node.js and MongoDB is preferred.
requirements: Proficiency in Node.js and Express.js
Experience with databases like MongoDB or PostgreSQL
Understanding of authentication and security best practices
Ability to optimize API performance

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Looking for a creative UI/UX designer proficient in Figma, Adobe XD, and wireframing tools.
requirements: Experience with UI/UX tools like Figma, Adobe XD
Ability to create wireframes and high-fidelity designs
Understanding of user-centered design principles
Basic knowledge of HTML & CSS is a plus

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: We need a cybersecurity expert to monitor, analyze, and enhance our security infrastructure.
requirements: Knowledge of network security protocols
Experience with penetration testing and threat analysis
Familiarity with security compliance standards (ISO, GDPR)
Ability to respond to security incidents quickly

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are hiring a DevOps Engineer to manage CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation.
requirements: Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Proficiency in CI/CD tools like Jenkins or GitHub Actions
Understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Infrastructure as Code (IaC) experience with Terraform or Ansible
